main.name: Fezile Manana
main.occupation: Computer Science Student and Algorithm Development Intern
main.description: Areas of interest/experience include Machine Learning, Game Development and Cyber Security
main.bio: Originally from Eswatini, my talents outside of computer science include music, art and dance. I have been a member of and lead several rock bands throughout my educational career and I have over 2 years experience in Argentinian Tango.
main.contactmessage: Send a direct message to me in the form below.

resume.skillmessage: A list of skills that is still expanding

education.description: During my time at Jacobs I have gained invaluable skills and and knowledge that I have already begun using in my professional life. These range from the software development cycles to best practises and design patterns. Relevant courses include: Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Secure and Dependable Systems, Software Engineering and Operating Systems.
The IB Diploma Programme is an internationally recognised pre-university course that cohere to high education standards. Subjects of focus include: Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.

work.title: Algorithm Development Intern
work.description: I researched and implemented algirithms to reduce the memory footprint and improve efficiency of gas sensor products. I also prototyped a proof of concept for a firmware update specification of a new sensor signal conditioner.
